item.title: Fix My code plz [317]
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

  1. Learn to use [ code ] tags…
  2. The code is same as errors.

@Edit:
I think you need to use:

if(itemID == 1203 && playerRights = 1) {
triggerTele(3094, 3107, 0) ;
}

if(itemID == 1205 && playerRights = 2) { 
triggerTele(2525, 4776, 0) ;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Fix My code plz [317]
item.dc:creator: @m_st3r8 m st3r8
item.description:
@m_st3r8 wrote:

the code:

if(itemID == 1203) && playerRights = 1) {
triggerTele(3094, 3107, 0) ;
}

if(itemID == 1205) && playerRights = 2) {
triggerTele(2525, 4776, 0) ;
}

the errors:

client.java:10588: illegal start of expression
if(itemID == 1203) && playerRights = 1) ; {
^
client.java:10588: ‘;’ expected
if(itemID == 1203) && playerRights = 1) ; {
^
client.java:10592: illegal start of expression
if(itemID == 1205) && playerRights = 2) ; {
^
client.java:10592: ‘;’ expected
if(itemID == 1205) && playerRights = 2) ; {
^

Read full topic
